subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Jack Cust hit two home runs and walked three times, not making an out in the Athletics’ 10-2 victory over the White Sox, but Ben Sheets was placed on the disabled list.
snippet: Jack Cust hit two home runs and walked three times, not making an out in the Athletics’ 10-2 victory over the White Sox, but Ben Sheets was placed on the disabled list.
